      • removeRefreshListener

        public void removeRefreshListener(RefreshListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: Drawable
        Removes a refresh listener that was called whenever this Drawable needed to be redrawn by the GUI. Does nothing if the listener was never added.
        Specified by:
